short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds delicious recipes to your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you new recipe ideas directly on your new tab. You will see 3 delicious ideas each time you load your page and if those don't catch your eye, just refresh the recipes module and get new ideas. Also included in this extension is a web search powered by Yahoo!

For more information please see these links: 

Privacy policy: https://recipesnewtab.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use:  https://recipesnewtab.com/terms-of-service/
Contact us: https://recipesnewtab.com/contact
Uninstall info: https://recipesnewtab.com/uninstall/
About us: https://recipesnewtab.com/about-us/

Permissions requested by this extension:

Storage: Keeps the last 3 recipes in local storage until the next set of recipes is requested.
